name: Jonathan Sher
label: Computer Science Student
summary: I'm a Computer Information Technology student at CSUN, passionate about data science, AI/ML, and networking. Formerly a Data Science student at the University of Sydney, I’m skilled in Python, Java, R, and SQL. I’m driven to pursue a master’s in machine learning, focusing on computer vision and eager to apply my skills in a professional setting and solve problems.

work_experience.position: CSUN Senator College of Engineering & Computer Science
work_experience.summary: I advocated for 1,000+ students in the College of Engineering & Computer Science, voicing their concerns to university administration, faculty, and staff to drive policy changes.
highlights: Served on the Academic Affairs Committee, working on academic policy changes and student success initiatives
Collaborated with the College of Engineering & Computer Science Dean to address student concerns and improve the student experience
Organized and hosted events to promote student engagement and foster a sense of community within the college

work_experience.summary: I lead as a Lower Division Senator on the Associated Student Leadership, representing all lower division students, an estimated 17,000 students, by advocating for their needs and concerns to the administration, faculty, and staff.
highlights: Served on the Internal Affairs Committee and was Vice Chair of this committee for a semester, working on making revisions to the AS codes
Managed CSUN Associated Students' social media presence, creating and sharing engaging content to promote events, highlight student achievements, and strengthen campus community engagement.

projects.title: Emoji Maker– Web-Based & AI-Integrated Emoji Customization Tool
projects.summary: Integrated the Stable Diffusion XL (SDXL) Emoji Generator API, allowing AI-powered emoji creation for enhanced customization using a web-based interface combined with a text-to-emoji model.
highlights: Developed a web-based emoji customization tool using JavaScript, HTML, and CSS, enabling users to design and export personalized emojis.
Integrated the Stable Diffusion XL (SDXL) Emoji Generator API, allowing AI-powered emoji creation for enhanced customization.
Optimized SVG rendering and export functionality, ensuring high-quality downloads for user-generated emojis

Example of AI-Generated Boston Terrier Emoji
Example of AI-Generated Boston Terrier Emoji

projects.title: Movie Recommendation System – Collaborative Filtering
projects.summary: A movie recommendation system built with Python that leverages collaborative filtering techniques. This project uses the MovieLens 100k dataset to suggest movies to users based on their historical ratings. The system implements multiple recommendation models including a simple k‑Nearest Neighbors (k‑NN) model, an SVD-based model, and a hybrid approach. The application is deployed as a Streamlit web app via GitHub and Streamlit Community Cloud.
highlights: Implemented a collaborative filtering movie recommendation system using Python and the MovieLens 100k dataset.
Developed a k-Nearest Neighbors (k-NN) model, Singular Value Decomposition (SVD) model, and hybrid model for movie recommendations.
Deployed the application as a Streamlit web app via GitHub and Streamlit Community Cloud, allowing users to receive movie recommendations based on their historical ratings.
